content: उद्दीपनं {@--1@} Inflaming, exciting; क्रोध°, अग्नि°. {@--2@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) That which excites or feeds (a sentiment or {%rasa%}), any aggravating or attendant circumstance which gives poignancy to a feeling or passion; उद्दीपनविभावास्ते रसमुद्दीपयंति ये <ls>S. D. 160</ls>; see आलंबनं also. {@--3@} Illuminating, lighting, setting fire to, burning; <ls>Ve. 5. 25.</ls> {@--4@} Burning of a body.
